issue.message: Dependencies using groupId `com.android.support` and `androidx.*` can not be combined but found `com.android.support:support-v4:25.2.0` and `androidx.lifecycle:lifecycle-process:2.2.0` incompatible dependencies
A newer version of com.appsflyer:segment-android-integration than 6.5.2 is available: 6.10.3
